verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: threatened] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: to cut aid to South Sudan unless the country 's civil war ends and peace is restored .] [C-ARG0: White] [ARG1: House press]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: The Trump administration] threatened Tuesday to [V: cut] [ARG1: aid to South Sudan] [ARGM-ADV: unless the country 's civil war ends and peace is restored] . White House press
